name: IMDb - dark blue redesign
description:
Redesign of IMDb with the colors etc of style 843. The page is too comprehensive to say it's complete but all movie / series / actor / photo pages should be covered as well as the search pages. I didn't bother to meddle with the home page since i always search with a keyword search so i never get to see it. Needless to say all ads and amazon stuff is removed as well.

Do also check out:
style 4174
style 4178
style 1824

Edit:
...
06/01: multiple things fixed (photo pages .. video pages etc)
09/03: quick fix for recent design changes. Not much time right now so I will probably change some more stuff later
09/10: "Your rating" is displayed again
09/17: fixed the new action box in the sidebar and the new ratings.
03/10: @sonicspike41  fixed !
